definition: ambition of wild wolves (idiom); rapacious designs

sentences.english: Hungarians have had the ambition of becoming the masters of the Central Plains for many years.
sentences.chinese: 北方的匈奴多年来一直有入主中原的野心。

sentences.english: His wild ambition was thoroughly exposed.
sentences.chinese: 他的狼子野心暴露无遗。

sentences.english: They don't scramble against careerists for interest and power.
sentences.chinese: 野心家在那儿争权夺利，他们不会随之起舞。

sentences.english: They ventured on an ambitious program of reform.
sentences.chinese: 他们冒然采取一项野心勃勃的改革计画。

sentences.english: All it will take is a will to be ambitious and a determination to leave no stone unturned.
sentences.chinese: 这需要野心和不遗余力的决心。

sentences.english: They had the ambition to dominate this small country.
sentences.chinese: 他们有控制这个小国的野心。

sentences.english: Who says Russia's going to help China with her global ambitions?
sentences.chinese: 谁说俄罗斯会帮中国实现称霸全球的野心啊？

sentences.english: The Saudi intent to thwart Iran's regional ambitions is clearest in Lebanon.
sentences.chinese: 沙特阻遏伊朗地区野心的意图在黎巴嫩最为明显。

sentences.english: He's a very smart and ambitious guy.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个非常聪明且野心勃勃的家伙。

sentences.english: Sol land Neilson: individual ambition serves the common good.
sentences.chinese: 个人的野心髧往往会促进公共利益。

sentences.english: China's most ambitious undertaking is a new deep-sea port for oil tankers.
sentences.chinese: 中国最野心勃勃的事业是一个新建的油轮深海港口。

sentences.english: Ambition is a drug that makes its addicts potential madmen.
sentences.chinese: 野心是一种毒品，它会使那些有疯癫潜质的人上瘾。

sentences.english: And she had no ambition to venture outside the Bronx.
sentences.chinese: 而她也没有去布朗克斯以外的地方探索的野心。

sentences.english: They need to resist the urge to "improve" or control these networked conversations.
sentences.chinese: 他们必须克制“改善”或控制这些网络性会话的野心。

sentences.english: And then there are ambitious souls looking to marry up with China’s newly well-off.
sentences.chinese: 然后指望和中国新贵结婚的野心家们出现了。

definition: determination/resolution/determined/firm and resolute/to make up one's mind/CL:個|个[ge4]
ambition of wild wolves (idiom); rapacious designs
to covet/to long for/to lust after
